#summary Native Client system calls

The syscall numbers are defined in [http://code.google.com/p/nativeclient/source/browse/trunk/src/native_client/src/trusted/service_runtime/include/bits/nacl_syscalls.h src/trusted/service_runtime/include/bits/nacl_syscalls.h].

 * close
 * read
 * write
 * lseek

 * sysbrk
 * mmap
 * munmap

 * getdents

 * exit
 * getpid
 * sched_yield
 * sysconf

 * gettimeofday
 * clock
 * nanosleep

 * imc_makeboundsock
 * imc_accept
 * imc_connect
 * imc_sendmsg
 * imc_recvmsg
 * imc_mem_obj_create:  create shared memory segment
 * imc_socketpair

 * mutex_create
 * mutex_lock
 * mutex_trylock
 * mutex_unlock
 * cond_create
 * cond_wait
 * cond_signal
 * cond_broadcast
 * cond_timed_wait_abs
 * sem_create
 * sem_wait
 * sem_post
 * sem_get_value

 * thread_create
 * thread_exit
 * tls_init
 * thread_nice
 * tls_get

 * srpc_get_fd:  what is this for?

== No-ops ==
 * null: for testing purposes only
 * ioctl: not implemented

== Debug mode syscalls ==
 * open
 * stat
 * chmod

 * multimedia_init
 * multimedia_shutdown
 * video_init
 * video_shutdown
 * video_update
 * video_poll_event
 * audio_init
 * audio_shutdown
 * audio_stream
